How many people are affected by X-linked infantile spasm syndrome ?,"Infantile spasms are estimated to affect 1 to 1.6 in 100,000 individuals. This estimate includes X-linked infantile spasm syndrome as well as infantile spasms that have other causes.",GHR,X-
